name: Bullet Blitz
description:
This game was created by MoistMelloJello and Nurd for Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1.  Bullet Blitz is a bullet hell where the player attempts to survive as long as they can. Every life, the player spawns with different stats for the Jam theme "An End Is A New Beginning". How long can you survive?

Controls

MoveWASD or Arrow Keys
DashLeft Shift (Cooldown resets on pixel burst)

The two of us are beginner game developers; one of us just started. This was our first game jam participation ever, and after juggling with school and work we managed to make something we are proud of. We weren't able to add everything we wanted in time, but we got most of it done.

Assets From:

https://pixel-poem.itch.io/dungeon-assetpuck

https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-dungeon-tileset

https://rpgpixel.itch.io/315-fantasy-rpg-iconspixel-art

https://beamedeighth.itch.io/simplekeys-animated-pixel-keyboard-keys

https://vrtxrry.itch.io/dungeonfont
